<% //send the email only if query parameters are set if (request.space==null) { println "$msg.get("watch.pressreview.noquery")"; } else if (request.address==null) { println "$msg.get("watch.email.noaddress")"; } else { //get the email parameters if (request.subject) { subject = request.subject; } else { subject = ""; } if (request.content) { content = request.content; } else { content = ""; } //for all the rest of parameters from the request, send them to the pressReview prDoc = xwiki.getDocument("WatchCode.PressReview"); //get addressses errorMessage = ""; error = false; addresses = ""; renderedPR = xwiki.renderText(prDoc.getContent(), doc); for (addr in request.getParameterValues("address")) { message = "
" + content + "
" + renderedPR + "
"; //mailResult = xwiki.mailsender.sendTextMessage(xwiki.getXWikiPreference("admin_email"), addr, subject, message); mailResult = xwiki.mailsender.sendHtmlMessage(" XWiki Watch " + "<" + xwiki.getXWikiPreference("admin_email") + ">", addr, null, null, subject, message, message, null); if (mailResult == 0) { if (!addresses.equals("")) { addresses += ", "; } addresses += addr; } else { error = true; errorMessage = errorMessage + " " + context.error; } } //report if (error) { println "$msg.get("watch.email.error") " + errorMessage; } else { println "$msg.get("watch.email.success") " + addresses; } } %>
